mapper.update:
update motor_info
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
model = #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
manufacturer_id = #{manufacturerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
made_country = #{madeCountry,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
market_time = #{marketTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
retail_price = #{retailPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
displacement = #{displacement,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cylinders_num = #{cylindersNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stroke = #{stroke,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
per_cylinder_valve = #{perCylinderValve,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
maximum_power = #{maximumPower,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
maximum_torque = #{maximumTorque,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fuel_consumption = #{fuelConsumption,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gear = #{gear,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tank_capacity = #{tankCapacity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
weight = #{weight,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
maximum_speed = #{maximumSpeed,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
brake_system = #{brakeSystem,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
instrument = #{instrument,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
type = #{hot,jdbcType=INTEGER},
type = #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update motor_info set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, model = #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, manufacturer_id = #{manufacturerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, made_country = #{madeCountry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, market_time = #{marketTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, retail_price = #{retailPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, displacement = #{displacement,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cylinders_num = #{cylindersNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stroke = #{stroke,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, per_cylinder_valve = #{perCylinderValve,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, maximum_power = #{maximumPower,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, maximum_torque = #{maximumTorque,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fuel_consumption = #{fuelConsumption,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gear = #{gear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tank_capacity = #{tankCapacity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, weight = #{weight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, maximum_speed = #{maximumSpeed,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, brake_system = #{brakeSystem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, instrument = #{instrument,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, hot = #{hot,jdbcType=INTEGER}, img = #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT c.`value`, m.`name`, m.id, m.hot FROM motor_info m, CODE c WHERE m.type = c.id

SELECT a.id, a.`name`, a.model, b.manufacturer_name, c.country, a.market_time, a.retail_price, a.displacement, a.img, a.cylinders_num, a.stroke, a.per_cylinder_valve, a.maximum_power, a.maximum_torque, a.fuel_consumption, a.gear, a.tank_capacity, a.weight, a.brake_system, a.instrument, a.maximum_speed, d.`value` type, a.hot FROM motor_info a, manufacturer b, country c, `code` d WHERE a.manufacturer_id = b.id AND a.made_country = c.ccode AND a.type = d.id AND a.id = #{id}
